samples.name: Basic Card
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to design basic card and weather layout card using Essential JS2 Card component. The component is pure CSS component and more flexible.

samples.name: Vertical Card
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to design a business card and profile card using a vertical layout of Card component based on its CSS classes.

samples.name: Horizontal Card
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to design product card with icon and its specification using horizontal layout in Card component.

samples.name: Swipeable Card
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to design a stacked card with swipeable action (left or right direction) and corresponding images using Card component.

samples.name: Flip Card
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to achieve flip (rotate) behavior to the card to show hidden information which is on a back side in the Card component.

samples.name: Reveal Card
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to render a card with reveal layouts. Hidden information of Card can be revealed to visible while action on “Know more”.

samples.name: Tile Card
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to design tile-view with filtering and searching using a template engine, data manager, and Card component.
